Au même moment, un gang de braqueurs particulièrement violents dévalisent une bijouterie et tuent une femme qui s'y trouvait. Buren et ses hommes parviennent à arrêter des suspects. Mais ces derniers n'avouent rien et sont libérés.

programme.title: C'est arrivé près de chez vous
programme.desc: Dans un train, Ben étrangle une voyageuse. Un peu plus tard, calme et souriant, il explique avec minutie et détails comment lester un cadavre avant de le jeter à l'eau. A l'équipe de télévision qui le filme, il raconte sa vie de tueur-artisan, assassin modeste qui trucide les petites gens avant de les détrousser. En ce début de mois, il attaque un facteur pour récupérer l'adresse de ses futures victimes.

programme.title: Dévoilées
programme.desc: En 1970, Isabelle Sauser, 24 ans, vient d'accompagner son mari Laurent à l'aéroport lorsqu'elle apprend, deux heures plus tard, que l'avion de celui-ci vient de s'écraser. En 2018, Isabelle vit avec sa petite-fille de 21 ans, Anaïs, en Suisse. Un jour, elle l'aperçoit dans un train, entièrement voilée. Sans oser en parler à Anaïs, elle prévient aussitôt Léa. Laquelle saute dans un avion pour tenter de comprendre la conversion de sa fille, en pleine radicalisation. Si Isabelle refuse de confronter Anaïs à sa découverte par crainte de la faire fuir, cette conversion fait resurgir les fantômes de son passé.

programme.title: Parole contre parole
programme.desc: Laura, jeune commissaire-priseur, voit sa vie basculer le jour où Guillaume Miller, galeriste séduisant et respecté de tous, la viole après une soirée passée ensemble pour fêter une grosse vente. Le même soir, la femme de Guillaume est assassinée chez elle. La police suspecte immédiatement le mari qui pour se disculper avoue le viol de Laura. La jeune femme convoquée par le juge, choisit de mentir. Elle préfère qu’il prenne 20 ans pour meurtre que 8 ans pour viol. Mais vengeance n'est pas réparation..

programme.title: Mike
programme.desc: C'est le mariage de Caroline et Juliette. On apprend que Juliette a elle aussi tendance à l'infidélité. Mike, une fois n'est pas coutume, se révèle très classe et sauve le mariage..

programme.title: Mike
programme.desc: Caro et Juliette se séparent lors de leur nuit de noce. Caro décide d'en finir avec Juliette et Mike. Serge déclare sa flamme à Franck. Mike doit partir à Los Angeles pour enregistrer avec un grand producteur. Sur le chemin de l'aéroport, il change d'avis et va retrouver Caro..

programme.title: Un peu, beaucoup, aveuglément
programme.desc: Une jeune pianiste, passionnée par son art mais peu sûre d'elle, s'installe enfin seule dans un appartement. Mais, dès la première nuit, d'étranges bruits l'effraient et la poussent à revenir chez Evguénie, son protecteur et professeur de piano. Le lendemain, elle persiste et découvre que son voisin le plus proche, un inventeur solitaire, voulait lui faire quitter son appartement. Entre les deux démarre une guerre sonore. Pourtant, bientôt, ils apprennent à se connaître.

programme.title: Le grand alibi
programme.desc: Un homme volage, Pierre Collier, est assassiné lors d'un week-end de villégiature chez le sénateur Pagès. Claire, sa femme, est la principale suspecte car elle a été arrêtée près du corps de la victime, une arme en main. Pourtant l'inspecteur Grange découvre que cette arme n'est pas celle du crime et que quasiment tous les convives du week-end avaient une bonne raison de vouloir la mort de Pierre Collier.

programme.title: Succession
Succession

programme.title: Larry et son nombril
programme.sub-title: S11 E6 Larry vs. la femme demi-portion

programme.title: Sept jours en enfer
programme.desc: En 2014, sur les pelouses de Wimbledon, l'ancienne gloire du tennis Aaron Williams et le jeune prodige Charles Poole s'affrontent dans le cadre du prestigieux tournoi du grand chelem. Mais ce match se révèle vite interminable, long de sept jours, avec un scénario sportif et extra-sportif improbable. Les médias reviennent sur l'histoire de ce match incroyable, en interviewant certains des témoins de l'événement, comme John McEnroe ou Serena Williams.

programme.title: Pharmacy Road
programme.desc: En juillet 1982, la France est à nouveau traversée par le peloton du Tour de France. Au fil d'une enquête aussi improbable que loufoque, une fausse équipe de reporters tente de comprendre comment les coureurs ont vécu cette édition de la course cycliste la plus prestigieuse au monde. L'événement est marqué par le dopage de maints participants. Avec dérision se défont les lacets équivoques d'une course et de tout une discipline où le dopage semblait admis par - presque - tous..

programme.title: Ceux qui travaillent
programme.desc: Frank, cadre supérieur dans une compagnie de fret maritime, est toujours le premier arrivé et le dernier parti à son travail. Sans avoir fait d'études mais à force de ténacité, il est parvenu à obtenir ce poste. Un jour, afin d'éviter de fortes pénalités à son entreprise, il se prend de franchir la ligne jaune en donnant un pot de vin à un capitaine de navire incompétent. La direction l'apprend et le licencie. Après un rendez-vous piège avec une entreprise concurrente, il a beaucoup de mal à retrouver un poste. Un ami finit par lui proposer un emploi où sa morale est mise à l'épreuve.

programme.title: Les éblouis
programme.desc: Christine et Frédéric, les parents de la jeune Camille, voudraient intégrer une communauté dirigée par Luc-Marie, le berger. Camille fait un sketch de clown où elle se moque gentiment de la prière. Luc-Marie lui interdit de rester dans son école de cirque. Sa mère, fragile, lui ordonne d'obéir. Les parents de Christine s'inquiètent pour les enfants. Luc-Marie réussit à manipuler Christine afin de les écarter. Camille tombe amoureuse de Boris, un élève de son école de cirque. Quand elle apprend que ses parents ont été dépouillés par la secte, elle se rebelle.

programme.title: Yves
programme.desc: Jerem, un rappeur raté, vit chez sa grand-mère en se nourrissant de pizza, bananes et autres biscuits plongés dans du lait. Contre de l'argent, il accepte de tester Yves, un frigo high tech et ultra-connecté. So, qui travaille pour la société Digital Cool, vient lui livrer la machine qui parle et qui s'occupe de tout. Elle se demande si elle a bien fait d'avoir sélectionné Jérémy, trop dilettante à son goût. De son côté, le jeune homme n'apprécie pas l'autoritarisme d'Yves concernant les courses. Quand Jérémy veut arrêter le test, Yves fait livrer des enceintes.

programme.title: True Blood
True Blood
programme.sub-title: S1 E11 Jusqu'à ce que la mort nous sépare
programme.desc: True Blood: Created by Alan Ball. With Anna Paquin, Stephen Moyer, Sam Trammell, Ryan Kwanten. Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: True Blood
True Blood
programme.sub-title: S1 E12 La fin d'un cauchemar
programme.desc: True Blood: Created by Alan Ball. With Anna Paquin, Stephen Moyer, Sam Trammell, Ryan Kwanten. Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Virgin Secrets
programme.desc: Melissa Moody, enceinte de plusieurs mois, vient se présenter au domicile des Chase. Elle est reçue par Charlene et Philip, la mère et le frère cadet de Ronnie, mort cinq ans plus tôt. Melissa, qui n'a connu que Ronnie, affirme que le bébé qu'elle attend est de lui. Totalement incrédule et toujours affectée par la mort de son fils, Charlene renvoie aussitôt Melissa, qui part trouver refuge chez Bill et Gail Erwin. Le couple s'occupe de la jeune femme depuis qu'elle est en froid avec ses parents, effrayés par sa crise mystique.

programme.title: Belgica
programme.desc: Au début des années 2000, à Gand, Jo vient d'ouvrir un bar, le Belgica. Son frère aîné, Franck, qui se sent un peu enfermé dans sa vie de mari et jeune père, propose à Jo de l'aider dans la gestion de l'établissement. Il commence à faire venir des musiciens dans le bar, qui connait vite un grand succès auprès de la clientèle locale. Si le lieu est réputé pour son ambiance survoltée, l'alcool et la drogue y circulent beaucoup, provoquant des dérapages.

programme.title: Balnéothérapie
programme.desc: Jonas et Cléo sont partis observer les baleines. Pourtant, lorsque le jeune couple arrive a¶ destination, la station balnéaire est complétement déserte et particulièrement inquiétante. Face a¶ cet environnement hostile, Cléo espère que Jonas saura la protéger du danger.

programme.title: Malgré elles
programme.desc: En 1943, en Alsace, Alice et Lisette, deux jeunes filles de 17 ans, sont arrachées à leur famille par les nazis. A leur arrivée en Allemagne, elles passent six mois dans un camp d'endoctrinement avant d'être envoyées dans une usine d'armement où elles remplissent des obus. Un jour, une explosion se produit. Les jeunes Françaises, soupçonnées de sabotage, sont alors menacées d'être internées dans un camp de redressement.

programme.title: La cour de Babel
programme.desc: A la suite de Maryam, qui vient de Libye, des adolescents écrivent le mot «bonjour» au tableau d'une salle de classe, chacun dans sa langue d'origine. Très vite, les discussions sont vives entre les jeunes élèves, qui font tous partie d'une classe d'accueil implantée au collège de la Grange-aux-Belles, dans le 10e arrondissement de Paris. Ces adolescents, qui viennent d'arriver en France, racontent leurs parcours, très différents les un des autres. La cinéaste Julie Bertuccelli suit quelques mois de scolarité de ces jeunes gens, aux personnalités très affirmées.

programme.title: Ma mère, le crabe et moi
programme.desc: Depuis quelque temps, Tania, une adolescente, constate que sa mère, Cathy, est fuyante. Elle la soupçonne d'avoir un amant mais elle est loin de se douter de la réalité. Cathy est dans la tourmente depuis que les médecins lui ont diagnostiqué un cancer du sein. Elle appréhende la réaction de Tania, jeune fille insouciante et toujours entre deux conflits avec elle. Mais celle-ci va la surprendre et l'accompagner - tel un vrai petit soldat - dans cette lutte contre la maladie.

programme.title: What's My Name: Muhammad Ali
programme.desc: Le boxeur Muhammad Ali, né Cassius Clay, n'était pas un simple boxeur au talent évident. Sa vie, ses vies, son parcours, traversent la seconde partie du 20e siècle et sont autant de grilles de lecture de la société, américaine en particulier. Le réalisateur Antoine Fuqua revient sur cette histoire, faite de drames et de combats.

programme.title: What's My Name: Muhammad Ali
programme.desc: Antoine Fuqua revient sur le parcours, ou plutôt les parcours, de la vie de Muhammad Ali (1942-2016), qui était plus qu'un boxeur mais surtout un symbole.

programme.title: You Cannot Kill David Arquette
programme.desc: Après avoir remporté le championnat du monde de lutte dans la catégorie des poids lourds en 2000, l'ancien acteur David Arquette tente l'exploit de remonter sur le ring à presque 50 ans. Ses amis et ses proches apportent leurs témoignages dans ce documentaire portrait.

programme.title: Cowboys
programme.desc: Un soir, Josie, surnommée Joe, révèle à son père Troy qu'elle n'est pas seulement le garçon manqué qu'il croyait, mais un véritable garçon enfermé dans un corps de fille de 11 ans. Si Troy, désemparé, comprend son enfant, sa femme Sally n'accepte pas le changement d'identité de sa fille. Un matin, Troy, séparé de sa femme, part sans avertissement avec Joe en randonnée dans les montagnes sauvages du Montana. Les deux veulent expérimenter la vie à la belle étoile des cowboys d'autrefois. Croyant à un kidnapping de la part de Troy, Sally alerte la police.

programme.title: Take Shelter
programme.desc: Dans l'Ohio, Curtis LaForche vit modestement avec sa femme Samantha et leur petite fille sourde, Hannah. Fragile psychologiquement, Curtis est perturbé par des visions apocalyptiques. Persuadé de l'imminence d'un cataclysme, il s'est mis en tête de construire un abri contre les tempêtes dans le jardin. Même s'il consulte un psychologue, Samantha se fait du souci pour lui, d'autant qu'il engage beaucoup de frais pour réaliser son œuvre.

programme.title: L'angle mort
programme.desc: Fils de musiciens, Dominick Brassan a le pouvoir de devenir invisible. A près de 40 ans, Dominique passe beaucoup de temps avec sa compagne Viveka, avec laquelle il ne s'est néanmoins pas engagé outre mesure, et travaille comme modeste employé dans une boutique de guitares. Comprenant son potentiel, son patron veut le faire progresser, mais Dominick tien vraisemblablement à rester une place qui ne lui convient pas. Tout comme il cache à tous son don d'invisibilité qu'il n'assume pas du tout.

programme.title: Larry et son nombril
programme.sub-title: S11 E6 Larry vs. la femme demi-portion

programme.title: Les liens du sang
programme.desc: Dans les années 1970, François, jeune et brillant policier, apprend que son frère aîné, Gabriel, va sortir de prison après dix ans d'incarcération pour meurtre. François décide d'épauler Gabriel, lui prête une chambre et lui trouve un emploi. Dans le même temps, il tombe amoureux de Corinne, compagne d'un truand qu'il a arrêté. Gabriel, lui, essaie d'entamer une nouvelle vie mais il subit plusieurs échecs.

programme.title: Rencontre à Hampstead Park
programme.desc: Emily Walters, une américaine, tient une petite boutique de vêtements à Hampstead Heath, un quartier bourgeois de Londres. Malgré les tentatives répétées de ses amies de lui trouver un nouveaux compagnon, la sexagénaire vit toujours seule depuis la mort de son mari Charles, un personnage infidèle qui la laissée endettée. Dans le même quartier, Donald Horner mène une existence bien différente, dans une petite cabane, vivant d'expédients. Mais celle-ci est menacée par l'arrivée d'un promoteur immobilier désireux de construire dans le quartier.

programme.title: Boule et Bill
programme.desc: En France, en 1976, Boule, 9 ans, et ses parents s'arrêtent au chenil lors d'une promenade dominicale et ils découvrent un cocker. Malgré l'opposition du père, le chiot, baptisé Bill, est rapidement adopté. Mais, bien qu'animé de bonnes intentions, il multiplie les catastrophes. Quand la famille doit déménager pour Paris, le père tente, sans succès, d'en profiter pour se débarrasser de lui. C'est le moment où la tortue Caroline intègre la famille. Elle tombe amoureuse de Bill.

programme.title: Hashtag Boomer
programme.sub-title: S1 E3 Un menu C13, sans orgasme, ni capote

programme.title: Hashtag Boomer
programme.sub-title: S1 E4 Sacré coup ta mère

programme.title: L'ivresse du pouvoir
programme.desc: Jeanne Charmant-Killman, juge à Paris, instruit une délicate affaire touchant aux milieux politiques et industriels. D'emblée, elle fait incarcérer pour détournement de fonds Michel Humeau, le président d'un puissant groupe industriel public qu’elle commence à interroger avec acharnement. Comme les autres personnes impliquées, Humeau reste muet. Jeanne se voit adjoindre une seconde magistrate avec qui elle travaille en bonne intelligence. Bientôt, les pressions pour la stopper vont s'intensifiant. Jeanne, incorruptible, se sent de plus en plus menacée.

programme.title: Madame Claude
programme.desc: A Paris, à la fin des années 1960, Fernande Grudet est à la tête d'une maison close très réputée. Plus connue sous le pseudonyme de Madame Claude, elle dirige avec rigueur et fermeté son établissement, discret mais fréquenté par des personnalités, des policiers et parfois même des politiques. Elle applique la même fermeté quand elle choisit ses nouvelles prostituées. Parmi ses nouvelle recrues, une jeune femme se distingue nettement : Sidonie, venue de la bonne société, dotée d'un bon carnet d'adresse et d'une forte personnalité, séduit rapidement Madame Claude.

programme.title: Populaire
programme.desc: A la fin des années 50, Rose Pamphyle, qui s'est entrainée quelque temps dans l'épicerie familiale, vient d'être embauchée comme secrétaire dans le cabinet d'assurance de Louis Echard. Peu convaincu par ses talents de secrétaire mais épaté par sa rapidité, celui-ci décide d'inscrire la jeune femme à un concours de vitesse dactylographique. Après un premier échec, Louis propose à Rose de venir s'entraîner chez lui en vue de la prochaine compétition.

programme.title: Music
programme.desc: Atteinte de troubles autistiques, la jeune Music vit avec sa grand-mère. S’échappant dans un monde de rêve, Music mène par ailleurs une existence pleine de rituels. Un jour, sa grand-mère meurt. La jeune fille est alors confiée à sa demi-soeur, Zu, une toxicomane récemment sortie de cure. Cette dernière ne sait pas bien comment s’y prendre et commet des maladresses. Lors d’une crise de Music, Ebo, un voisin, propose son aide à Zu. il sait comment calmer l’adolescente. Et Zu trouve un livre laissé par sa grand-mère qui détaille la routine quotidienne de Music.

programme.title: Shaun le mouton, le film
programme.desc: Shaun, un jeune mouton, grandit dans une petite ferme tenue par un éleveur aussi sympathique que myope. Mais, les journées puis les années passent, un peu répétitives et Shaun rêve de changer d'air. Avec d'autres animaux, le mouton organise un plan d'évasion. Après avoir détourné, avec l'aide précieuse du canard, l'attention de Blitzer, le chien de berger, Shaun et les autres moutons parviennent à endormir le fermier. Mais leur plan dérape et la caravane dans laquelle le fermier est endormi dévale la route. Blitzer tente alors de la rattraper. Peu de temps après, les moutons, livrés à eux-mêmes, comprennent qu'ils ont besoin du fermier. Shaun part en ville pour le retrouver.

programme.title: Un heureux événement
programme.desc: Etudiante en philosophie, Barbara Dray fait la connaissance de Nicolas Malle, qui travaille dans un vidéoclub. Il parvient à la séduire et ils s'installent ensemble. Lors de vacances, Nicolas convainc Barbara de faire un bébé. Un jour, la jeune femme annonce à Nicolas qu'elle est enceinte. Pendant sa grossesse, Barbara passe par tous les états. Et vient enfin le jour de l'accouchement, qui se déroule sans encombre. Mais c'est le début d'une véritable détresse pour Barbara, qui ne parvient pas à se faire à cette nouvelle vie.

programme.title: The Song of Names
programme.desc: Juste avant que la Seconde Guerre mondiale éclate, Dovidl Rapoport, un jeune virtuose polonais d'origine juive, est confié à une famille bourgeoise londonienne. D'abord jaloux, Martin, le fils unique des Simmonds, finit par se lier d'amitié avec lui. En 1951, juste avant un concert important, Dovidl, alors âgé de 21 ans, disparaît sans laisser de traces. Des décennies plus tard, Martin, devenu critique musical, est toujours à sa recherche. Un jour, il pense tenir une piste quand il voit un jeune violoniste tenir son archet de la même manière que Dovidl.

programme.title: Jackpot
programme.desc: Abandonnée par son fiancé Mason, Joy McNally s'offre une virée à Las Vegas, capitale mondiale du jeu. Là, elle fait la connaissance du séduisant Jack Fuller, qui vient de se faire renvoyer par son patron. Après une nuit arrosée, les deux jeunes gens se réveillent dans le même lit, la bague au doigt et avec un chèque de trois millions de dollars ! De retour à New York, ils se disputent le magot.

programme.title: Very Bad Things
programme.desc: Kyle Fisher va épouser la belle mais très autoritaire Laura. Respectant la tradition, il part à Las Vegas enterrer sa vie de garçon avec ses amis de toujours, Charles, Robert, Michael et Adam. Dans un hôtel luxueux, ils se livrent à tous les excès et louent les services d'une strip-teaseuse. Mais Michael entraîne la fille dans la salle de bains et lui transperce accidentellement le crâne avec un portemanteau.

programme.title: Shock Wave
programme.desc: A Hongkong, J.S. Cheung, officier de police spécialiste du déminage et des explosifs, a depuis longtemps infiltré le gang du redoutable Peng Hong, qui multiplie les braquages hautement préparés. Pour leur nouveau coup, les gangsters ont mis en place un dispositifs de taxis piégés, leur permettant de détourner l'attention des forces de l'ordre. Alors que les braqueurs sèment le chaos, Cheung, dans un de leurs véhicule, fait tout pour les empêcher de nuire. Ce faisant, il parvient à arrêter le jeune frère de Peng Hong alors que celui-ci parvient à prendre la fuite.

programme.title: Thalasso
programme.desc: Cinq ans après avoir été kidnappé, l'écrivain Michel Houellebecq doit prendre soin de sa santé vacillante après trop d'excès de boisson et se rend dans un centre de thalassothérapie. Les soins, l'interdiction de fumer et le régime sans alcool obligatoires ne l'enchantent guère. Tout comme l'acteur Gérard Depardieu, patient également, et avec lequel il se lie d'amitié. Ensemble, ils boivent en cachette, se racontent des choses intimes et parlent religion, philosophie et politique. Leur séjour est chamboulé quand des amis de l'écrivain lui demandent un service.

programme.title: Olla
programme.desc: Olla a répondu à une annonce sur un site de rencontre de femmes de l'est. Elle vient s'installer chez Pierre qui vit avec sa vieille mère. Mais rien ne va se passer comme prévu.

programme.title: Voyeurs
programme.desc: Le patron d'un hôtel a décidé de faire de son établissement le laboratoire de ses fantasmes. Derrière chaque porte se jouent des scènes de vie à l'abri des regards. Ce court métrage de genre pose la question du voyeurisme.

programme.title: Le temps des égarés
programme.desc: Sira travaille comme traductrice pour l'Ofpra, l'organisme français qui gère les demandes d'asile. Sans scrupules, elle profite de sa position pour extorquer des fonds aux réfugiés qui passent par elle. En échange, elle leur propose un récit de vie qui convaincra à coup sûr les autorités. Un jour, elle trouve devant chez elle une petite Africaine dont le père a été arrêté. De son côté, Abdul a fui l'Irak et les combattants de Daesh. Il arrive en France dans un container avec d'autres clandestins et rejoint Jean-Paul, un ami photographe, qui accepte de l'accueillir le temps de ses démarches.

programme.title: Les Trolls
programme.desc: Pendant longtemps, les trolls, de petites créatures colorées, vivaient heureux dans les arbres de la forêt où ils passaient leur temps à chanter, danser et à se faire des câlins. Jusqu'au jour où ils ont été découverts par les bergen, des monstres sinistres et géants, qui ont découvert qu'ils pouvaient être heureux en mangeant des trolls. Vingt ans ont passé et les trolls vivent cachés dans la forêt, sous la houlette du roi Peppy et de sa fille, la joyeuse princesse Poppy. Parmi eux, Branche, beaucoup moins joyeux, car il vit dans la crainte permanente que les bergen ne trouvent leur cachette.

programme.title: Ma vie en l'air
programme.desc: Yann, trentenaire célibataire et instructeur dans une compagnie aérienne, a une peur panique de l'avion depuis que sa mère est morte au cours d'un vol, en le mettant au monde. Traînant cette phobie comme un fardeau, il multiplie depuis les échecs sentimentaux en compagnie de Ludo, son meilleur ami. Mais l'existence de Yann va bientôt basculer avec l'arrivée d'Alice, sa charmante nouvelle voisine.

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: Poon Shing Fung et Tung Cheuk Man, deux brillants officiers artificiers de la police de Hongkong, sont appelés sur de périlleuses opérations de déminage. A cours de l'une d'entre elles, Shing Fung se trouve pris dans le feu d'une violente explosion, le laissant amputé d'une jambe. Désormais aidé d'une prothèse et déterminé à retrouver sa mobilité, Poon suit un programme sportif intensif, mais quitte la police. Cinq ans plus tard, un jeune homme muni d'une ceinture d'explosif commet un attentat meurtrier dans un immeuble de la ville. Selon toute vraisemblance, il appartient à un mouvement terroriste.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Dans le quartier de Harlem, à New York, en 1970, à la mort du caïd local dont il était le chauffeur et confident depuis quinze ans, Frank Lucas décide de prendre la relève. Jeune, ambitieux et intelligent, il ne veut dépendre de personne et met son propre réseau sur pied. Utilisant les avions de l'armée américaine, il importe des quantités massives d'héroïne et amasse rapidement une fortune colossale.

programme.title: The Passenger
programme.desc: Michael MacCauley, agent en assurances consciencieux dans une entreprise new yorkaise, mène une vie très bien réglée, rythmée par ses trajets quotidiens en train de banlieue. Alors qu'il vient d'apprendre qu'il était renvoyé après dix ans de bons et loyaux services, Michael, ancien policier, rejoint Alex, un ex-collègue dans un bar, avant de reprendre le train pour sa maison en banlieue. C'est au cours du trajet qu'il est interpellé par une femme mystérieuse, Joanna, qui lui propose de se livrer à une étrange expérience.

programme.title: The Big Short : le casse du siècle
programme.desc: Dans les années 1970, le métier de banquier n'était pas particulièrement à la mode, jusqu'à l'intervention de Lewis Ranieri, qui a mis à la mode les obligations hypothécaires. Un frénésie s'est emparée de la finance pendant une trentaine d'années, jusqu'à un arrêt brutal avec la crise mondiale de 2008. Jared Vennett explique comment un analyste financier et des investisseurs de Wall Street ont senti le vent tourner et parié sur l'échec d'un système voué à s'effondrer.

programme.title: Hashtag Boomer
programme.sub-title: S1 E3 Un menu C13, sans orgasme, ni capote

programme.title: Hashtag Boomer
programme.sub-title: S1 E4 Sacré coup ta mère

programme.title: Anonymous
programme.desc: En Angleterre, sous le règne de la Reine Elizabeth, Edward de Vere, comte d'Oxford, est, depuis son plus jeune âge, un écrivain de génie. Son rang ne lui permet pas d'endosser la paternité de ses œuvres, très critiques à l'égard de certaines personnes haut placées à la Cour. Il demande à Ben Jonson, modeste auteur, de les signer pour lui. William Shakespeare, un comédien de la troupe, va profiter de la situation.

programme.title: Fin des programmes
programme.desc: Zwischen 21 Uhr und 6 Uhr legt KiKA eine Sendepause ein.

programme.title: Inspecteur Lewis
programme.sub-title: S5 E4 Deux amants dans la nuit

programme.title: Miss Fisher enquête
programme.sub-title: S1 E9 La reine des fleurs

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.sub-title: S5 E13 La machine à explorer le temps

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.sub-title: S6 E1 La conquête du ciel

programme.title: Modern Murder : Secouristes en danger
programme.desc: Lors d'une mission sur les bords de l'Elbe, un ambulancier est assassiné dans son véhicule, sous les yeux impuissant de sa collègue, Greta Blaschke. Karin Gorniak et Leonie Winkler cherchent fébrilement le mobile du crime, lorsqu'elles apprennent que les ambulanciers subissent de plus en plus d'agressions. Peu de temps après, une deuxième attaque est menée dans laquelle une ambulancière décède sur le coup. Gorniak, Winkler et le chef du département de police, Schnabel, enquêtent dans toutes les directions..

programme.title: Fin des programmes
programme.desc: Zwischen 21 Uhr und 6 Uhr legt KiKA eine Sendepause ein.

programme.title: Inspecteur Lewis
programme.sub-title: S4 E1 Les secrets de Crèvecoeur

programme.title: Inspecteur Lewis
programme.sub-title: S4 E2 Vénus porteuse de mort

programme.title: Keeping Faith
programme.desc: Pour le capitaine Williams, Faith serait responsable de la disparition d'Evan. Mais les preuves manquent. Dans le même temps, Faith reçoit une lettre contenant avec un test de paternité. Elle se rend dans la foulée chez le psy d'Evan.

programme.title: Keeping Faith
programme.desc: Faith apprend par Steve qu'Evan est monté de force dans la voiture de la fille d'un mafieux, Dewi Glynn. Un an plus tôt, Evan a fait acquitter la jeune femme. Grâce à l'entremise de Steve, Faith parvient à rencontrer Glynn : le mafieux lui dit qu'Evan lui doit une importante somme d'argent.

programme.title: Thirteen
programme.desc: Enlevée, Ivy Moxam est séquestrée depuis treize ans. La jeune femme de 26 ans parvient à échapper à son ravisseur. Ivy est aussitôt prise en charge par les services sociaux. Les policiers Elliott Carne et Lisa Merchant se chargent de la première audition puis alertent les parents, Christina et Angus, séparés depuis la disparition d'Ivy. Tandis que l'enquête pour retrouver le ravisseur démarre, les retrouvailles familiales se révèlent complexes..

programme.title: Thirteen
programme.desc: Suspecté d'être le ravisseur de la jeune Ivy, Mark White kidnappe une nouvelle fille, Phoebe, âgée de 10 ans. Carne et Merchant découvrent qu'il travaillait au collège au moment du premier enlèvement. Une équipe de Scotland Yard, supervisée par David Burridge, reprend l'affaire en main. Les recherches des policiers s'orientent vers la mère de White, qui vivrait dans une maison de retraite. Tim et Ivy se voient en cachette..

programme.title: Thirteen
programme.desc: Le lieutenant Lisa Merchant convoque Eloise Wye pour avoir des informations sur le jour de l'enlèvement d'Ivy Moxam. De son côté, Ivy reçoit par courrier une déclaration d'amour de son kidnappeur. Ce dernier la prénomme Alison ! Les enquêteurs chargent un psychologue de répondre au criminel. La voisine de Carole White confie aux enquêteurs que la maison appartenait à Greg Hawthorne, le compagnon de Carole White. Tous deux ont eu un fils, Dylan Hawthorne, âgé de 7 ans au moment où Carole a chassé Mark de la maison, alors que celui-ci n'était âgé que de 16 ans.

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.sub-title: S1 E1 D'un courant à l'autre

programme.title: Kapitelweise
programme.sub-title: S1 E7 S1 E7 Erotik in der Literatur

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 2937900, Title: The Knick, --- Description: The Knick: Created by Jack Amiel, Michael Begler. With André Holland, Clive Owen, Jeremy Bobb, Juliet Rylance. A look at the professional and personal lives of the staff at New York's Knickerbocker Hospital during the early part of the twentieth century." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2937900/","name":"The Knick","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ5NzcyNDc5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDMyOTY5NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A look at the professional and personal lives of the staff at New York's Knickerbocker Hospital during the early part of the twentieth century.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2937900/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Haniwilliam7","dateCreated":"2014-08-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's not just another medical drama","reviewBody":"As a physician, I watched the entire House MD, Scrubs, most of ER and grey's anatomy. As a dedicated reader, I read a lot in medicine history. I'd like to reassure everyone who is afraid of watching another regular medical drama, this show is about medical history with it's bizarre and crazy events (which truly happened allover the course of medicine History), but in the same time it's a perfectly crafted piece of art from attention to small details to acting, writing, camera angels, sound tract and of course directing by Soderbergh.

Dr. John Thackery is a character built on 1900s Dr. William Stewart Halsted who is considered the greatest physician of the whole Johns Hopkins group, also Throughout his professional life, he was addicted to cocaine and later to morphine, which were not illegal during that time. The beauty about Thackery character is that it's a true character with his addiction and the predicted mood changes (even if there is some alteration, the character frame still the same, not like the case of G. House who was clearly a fictional character).

I don't want to go in details about the technical elements of the show, but one look over Steven Soderbergh's traffic, Erin Brockovich or even Ocean's eleven will be more than enough to understand that you are facing a spectacular show which has more and more to offer with each new episode (no wonder it was renewed for a second season before airing the first one).

The Knick is a too much sophisticated show to be compared with other shows from the same genre and IMO it shouldn't be compared with them at all. My advice to every one: see the first season now because if you're a TV person you will end up watching it anyway.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":46356,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.5,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2014-08-08","keywords":"1900s,surgeon,doctor,hospital,surgery","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2428245/","name":"André Holland","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0654110/","name":"Clive Owen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2205243/","name":"Jeremy Bobb"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017525/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0024856/","name":"Jack Amiel","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0066764/","name":"Michael Begler"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 2 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2103030553","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQzMDk1OTkxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjc5MjEwNzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQzMDk1OTkxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjc5MjEwNzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the Season 2 trailer for "The Knick"."</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 2191671, Title: Elementary, --- Description: Elementary: Created by Robert Doherty. With Jonny Lee Miller, Lucy Liu, Aidan Quinn, Jon Michael Hill. A modern take on the cases of Sherlock Holmes, with the detective now living in New York City." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2191671/","name":"Elementary","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDEyN2U1YTItNDY1Zi00YjljLWI5YzItNWU3YWViYjhiZTgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"A modern take on the cases of Sherlock Holmes, with the detective now living in New York City.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2191671/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"William_G","dateCreated":"2013-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"A different spin on a classic, A great show on its own merits","reviewBody":"Like many people, I love BBC's Sherlock and overlooked Elementary for many reasons. I recently decided to give it a chance and was pleasantly surprised to say the least. First off, don't make the same mistake I did and dismiss it for some of the rather odd sounding changes, it's intended to be a different spin on the classic and does so very well.

Jonny Lee Miller plays a great Sherlock. He's more human and flawed, where the original Sherlock was almost cartoonishly strong at times, but he still has the same confident eccentric brilliance that makes Sherlock Holmes so interesting. He's a recovering addict aided by Sober Companion Watson, a modern politically correct spin on classic Holmes drug use that feels tacked on and out of place at times, but helps drive the character development of both Holmes and Watson.

The new Watson angle was a big factor in what made me pass on the show at first. In addition to the Sober Companion job, it sounded very generic Hollywoody to find an excuse to shoehorn in a pretty female co-star, but Lucy Liu is very good in her role. She doesn't play a shallow sexy distraction from the story, rather just a different sex portraying the same inquisitive, intelligent, adventurous companion that Watson should be. And (as far as I am in the series - fingers crossed) there's no pointless romantic subplots between her and Sherlock, just a straight played female Watson. Hats off to Lucy Liu for making a tough character change that I was prepared to dislike so likable and real.

The best part of the show however is the writing. Writing good mysteries is a fine line to walk. You can either give too little information and blindside the viewer, leaving them feeling shut out and just along for the ride, or too much information delivered too overtly and ruin the fun of following step in step with the details. The truth has to be there somewhere for you to see but not too soon. Elementary manages to walk that line very well. There have been times when something was too obvious or too unpredictable, but much more often the truth is cleverly masked until just the right time - a little before it's revealed, if you're sharp. 

I went into this series with low expectations but very quickly fell in love with it. Whether you like the different spin on Arthur Conan Doyle's characters or not, Elementary does mystery right, and it's worth a watch based on that alone.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":105939,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2012-09-27","keywords":"new york city detective,british in america,detective,modernized setting,companionship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001538/","name":"Jonny Lee Miller","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005154/","name":"Lucy Liu","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001644/","name":"Aidan Quinn"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0395934/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1201266/","name":"Robert Doherty"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 4 First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2393551385","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA1MDgwOTE5OTJeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQ0NTU2MTcx._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA1MDgwOTE5OTJeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQ0NTU2MTcx._V1_.jpg","description":"See what's in store in season 4 of "Elemetary.""</script><metacontent="

By the end of it you will be quoting lines and wanting to dance for sure.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":85707,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Music","Romance"],"datePublished":"2008-06-04","keywords":"dance off,dancing in the rain,dance movie,dance audition,dance crew","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Step Up 2 the Streets","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1253179673","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3MTAyOTYzM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDMzNjAyMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3MTAyOTYzM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDMzNjAyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Step Up 2 the Streets Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1382207/","name":"Robert Hoffman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0263759/","name":"Briana Evigan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0144260/","name":"Cassie Ventura"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0160840/","name":"Jon M. programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0844441, Title: True Blood, --- Description: True Blood: Created by Alan Ball. With Anna Paquin, Stephen Moyer, Sam Trammell, Ryan Kwanten. Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756","dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0248654, Title: Six Feet Under, --- Description: Six Feet Under: Created by Alan Ball. With Peter Krause, Michael C. Hall, Frances Conroy, Lauren Ambrose. A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0248654/","name":"Six Feet Under","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FmMjg0Y2YtYmMyYi00MTBjLTllYzMtN2VjYzRhOTVmNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0248654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"alexkolokotronis","dateCreated":"2009-02-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"This Show Does The Impossible","reviewBody":"When using superlatives with this show it is totally fair. This show does something all other movies, shows, etc cannot do: it can safely apply any genre and still function as a deep and very entertaining show. As everybody episode goes by the show only becomes more addictive. It taps into almost every aspect of life. Every emotion is shown; love, hate, forgiveness, triumph and the list goes on and on. In fact this show depicts life the most realistically. The strangeness and peculiarity of the many themes perfectly displays the confusion in life and how it affects us. The show displays confusion in the clearest way making it almost impossible not to some how relate to the characters in the show. Not to mention also the series ends on one finest note you will ever see not just satisfying the viewer but taking the show to a level far and above anything else I have ever seen before. This show does the impossible twice over.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":127784,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-06-03","keywords":"funeral home,daydream,talking to the dead,husband wife relationship,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0470244/","name":"Peter Krause","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. Hall","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0175814/","name":"Frances Conroy"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010714/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030266/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Six Feet Under: The Complete Second Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2609381657","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Treme
Treme
Treme
programme.sub-title: S1 E5 S1 E5 Shame, Shame, Shame
programme.desc:
Treme: Created by Eric Ellis Overmyer, David Simon. With Khandi Alexander, Rob Brown, Kim Dickens, Melissa Leo. Life after Hurricane Katrina as the residents of New Orleans try to rebuild their lives, their homes, and their unique culture in the aftermath of one of the worst natural disasters in the USA." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1279972/","name":"Treme","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjg4ZGZkYjEtYTZhMy00YjU1LTg1MTYtNDlmNTAwYTA0M2NmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Life after Hurricane Katrina as the residents of New Orleans try to rebuild their lives, their homes, and their unique culture in the aftermath of one of the worst natural disasters in the USA.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1279972/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bilko-1"},"dateCreated":"2010-04-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"A major artistic achievement from David Simon","reviewBody":"My first impression, from watching episode one, was that the writing did not have the flow of "The Wire" it was trying too hard to register the many characters and to quickly tick off the various "types" that make up New Orleans society. Bunk and Freeman were too firmly placed in my memory for me to make the leap to Antoine and Albert. As for the Steve Zahn character, I instantly took a dislike to him and found him unrealistic in the extreme.

By the time we had reached the scene with the Big Chief emerging from the dark, I had become hooked. The characters started to make sense. The generous helping of musical scenes produced what must be the finest portrayal of live music and musicians I have ever seen. I could not wait to catch episode two.

I have now watched the first two episodes twice and all my first impressions have been blown away. Once you get to know the characters and can watch their introduction again, things start to make sense. Steve Zahn? What a brilliant comic creation. Just watch the intro to episode two, his creeping around Elvis Costello, his first day on the job. Absolutely first rate, The shocking introduction of violence, suddenly alters ones perceptions of a major character. Bunk, still lingers in the memory, but Antoine's blowing is going to change all that. I was not familiar with Khandi Alexander, but am now a major fan. Her performance is charismatic in the extreme.

I know that this series is not going to be to everyone's liking, but then neither is Shakespeare or Dickens. However, for those who enjoy a multi-faceted piece of work that can examine society in minute detail whilst never failing to entertain, this will surely rank as a major piece of American art.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14232,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2010-04-11","keywords":"21st century,post hurricane katrina,reference to hurricane katrina,radio station,alternative music","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0018554/","name":"Khandi Alexander"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0114532/","name":"Rob Brown"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0225332/","name":"Kim Dickens"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019588/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0284741/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0653899/","name":"Eric Ellis Overmyer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0800108/","name":"David Simon"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season Four Preview","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4226458905","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDAyMDM5NTg2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzI0NDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDAyMDM5NTg2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzI0NDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the season four trailer for "Treme"!"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 2937900, Title: The Knick, --- Description: The Knick: Created by Jack Amiel, Michael Begler. With André Holland, Clive Owen, Jeremy Bobb, Juliet Rylance. A look at the professional and personal lives of the staff at New York's Knickerbocker Hospital during the early part of the twentieth century." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2937900/","name":"The Knick","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ5NzcyNDc5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDMyOTY5NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A look at the professional and personal lives of the staff at New York's Knickerbocker Hospital during the early part of the twentieth century.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2937900/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Haniwilliam7","dateCreated":"2014-08-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's not just another medical drama","reviewBody":"As a physician, I watched the entire House MD, Scrubs, most of ER and grey's anatomy. As a dedicated reader, I read a lot in medicine history. I'd like to reassure everyone who is afraid of watching another regular medical drama, this show is about medical history with it's bizarre and crazy events (which truly happened allover the course of medicine History), but in the same time it's a perfectly crafted piece of art from attention to small details to acting, writing, camera angels, sound tract and of course directing by Soderbergh.

Dr. John Thackery is a character built on 1900s Dr. William Stewart Halsted who is considered the greatest physician of the whole Johns Hopkins group, also Throughout his professional life, he was addicted to cocaine and later to morphine, which were not illegal during that time. The beauty about Thackery character is that it's a true character with his addiction and the predicted mood changes (even if there is some alteration, the character frame still the same, not like the case of G. House who was clearly a fictional character).

I don't want to go in details about the technical elements of the show, but one look over Steven Soderbergh's traffic, Erin Brockovich or even Ocean's eleven will be more than enough to understand that you are facing a spectacular show which has more and more to offer with each new episode (no wonder it was renewed for a second season before airing the first one).

The Knick is a too much sophisticated show to be compared with other shows from the same genre and IMO it shouldn't be compared with them at all. programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 2937900, Title: The Knick, --- Description: The Knick: Created by Jack Amiel, Michael Begler. With André Holland, Clive Owen, Jeremy Bobb, Juliet Rylance. A look at the professional and personal lives of the staff at New York's Knickerbocker Hospital during the early part of the twentieth century." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2937900/","name":"The Knick","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ5NzcyNDc5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDMyOTY5NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A look at the professional and personal lives of the staff at New York's Knickerbocker Hospital during the early part of the twentieth century.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2937900/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Haniwilliam7","dateCreated":"2014-08-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's not just another medical drama","reviewBody":"As a physician, I watched the entire House MD, Scrubs, most of ER and grey's anatomy. As a dedicated reader, I read a lot in medicine history. I'd like to reassure everyone who is afraid of watching another regular medical drama, this show is about medical history with it's bizarre and crazy events (which truly happened allover the course of medicine History), but in the same time it's a perfectly crafted piece of art from attention to small details to acting, writing, camera angels, sound tract and of course directing by Soderbergh.

Dr. John Thackery is a character built on 1900s Dr. William Stewart Halsted who is considered the greatest physician of the whole Johns Hopkins group, also Throughout his professional life, he was addicted to cocaine and later to morphine, which were not illegal during that time. The beauty about Thackery character is that it's a true character with his addiction and the predicted mood changes (even if there is some alteration, the character frame still the same, not like the case of G. House who was clearly a fictional character).

I don't want to go in details about the technical elements of the show, but one look over Steven Soderbergh's traffic, Erin Brockovich or even Ocean's eleven will be more than enough to understand that you are facing a spectacular show which has more and more to offer with each new episode (no wonder it was renewed for a second season before airing the first one).

The Knick is a too much sophisticated show to be compared with other shows from the same genre and IMO it shouldn't be compared with them at all. My advice to every one: see the first season now because if you're a TV person you will end up watching it anyway.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":46356,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.5,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2014-08-08","keywords":"1900s,surgeon,doctor,hospital,surgery","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2428245/","name":"André Holland","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0654110/","name":"Clive Owen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2205243/","name":"Jeremy Bobb"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017525/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0024856/","name":"Jack Amiel","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0066764/","name":"Michael Begler"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 2 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2103030553","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQzMDk1OTkxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjc5MjEwNzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQzMDk1OTkxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjc5MjEwNzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the Season 2 trailer for "The Knick"."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Real Women Have Curves
Echte Frauen haben Kurven
programme.desc:
Real Women Have Curves: Directed by Patricia Cardoso. With America Ferrera, Lupe Ontiveros, Ingrid Oliu, George Lopez. In East Los Angeles, an 18-year-old struggles between her ambitions of going to college and the desires of her domineering mother for her to get married, have children, and oversee the small, rundown family-owned textile factory." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0296166/","name":"Real Women Have Curves","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTNlNzAxMjktZmViZi00ZmU4LWJjNTYtMzhlZmQzY2FhYzgxL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"In East Los Angeles, an 18-year-old struggles between her ambitions of going to college and the desires of her domineering mother for her to get married, have children, and oversee the small, rundown family-owned textile factory.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0296166/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"agbeme01"},"dateCreated":"2005-03-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"How challenging it is for smart children from uneducated families to pursue a higher education","reviewBody":"The movie Real Women Have Curves is a 2002 comedy directed by Patricia Cardoso. Ana (America Ferrera) is a young and smart girl from a Mexican immigrant family, who graduates from the famous Beverly High School of California, and gets accepted in Columbia University with a full scholarship. Controlled by her mother Mrs. Carmen (Lupe Ontiveros), who strongly believes that a girl's fate is to learn to work hard and learn to take care of her future husband. Raul Garcia (Jorge Cervera Jr.) Ana's father and Mr. Guzman (George Lopez) Ana's English teacher play wonderful mediators and defend Ana to go to college. 

This is a movie for everyone to see. Children can confront parents in laughter, while enjoying this together. It reveals the constant battle between mother and daughter, but most of all; it shows how challenging it is for smart children from uneducated families to pursue a higher education.

Although the comedian George Lopez, from the George Lopez show, is not an actor, he gives a high performance in this movie playing the role of the teacher who tries by all means to see one of his smartest students succeeding in what she deserves, despite the character hostile of Lupe Ontiveros, who sees her daughter going against the value of their traditions. 

This movie makes me think of the Cider House Rules, in which Dr. Larch (Michael Caine) always reminds Homer Well (Toby McGuire), his traditions and what he comes to accomplish in life. Like America Ferrera, it is hard for Toby McGuire to break the rules, and leave the orphanage to discover what is out there for him. 

Patricia Cardoso increases the suspense in this movie with the motif "red color," which appears every time America Ferrera's future is being discussed. She makes this screenplay so funny and devoid of bad scenes or language. This is what Robert Ebert from the Chicago Tribune calls "enormously entertaining for moviegoers of any age.""},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7369,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-11-08","keywords":"united states,usa,factory,mexican american,latino","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Real Women Have Curves","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi444793113","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjY2YTFjZjAtMDY4Ny00OTA5LThjZDAtYzAxODE5NGM0YzYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjY2YTFjZjAtMDY4Ny00OTA5LThjZDAtYzAxODE5NGM0YzYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from HBO Home Video"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1065229/","name":"America Ferrera"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0648913/","name":"Lupe Ontiveros"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0646488/","name":"Ingrid Oliu"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0136603/","name":"Patricia Cardoso"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129644/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0084164/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1058851/","name":"Josefina Lopez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0492215/","name":"George LaVoo"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Wizard of Lies
The Wizard of Lies
programme.desc: The Wizard of Lies: Directed by Barry Levinson. With Robert De Niro, Diana Henriques, Nathan Darrow, Alessandro Nivola. The fall of Bernie Madoff, whose Ponzi scheme robbed $65 billion from unsuspecting victims; the largest fraud in U.S. history." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1933667/","name":"The Wizard of Lies","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDIxOTMxNzc1Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzgyOTUxMjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The fall of Bernie Madoff, whose Ponzi scheme robbed $65 billion from unsuspecting victims; the largest fraud in U.S. history.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1933667/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Br4ve-trave1or"},"dateCreated":"2017-05-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Prepare yourself","reviewBody":"Some reviews argue that it should have been a mini series but I argue the opposite, this is perfection! To add would only dilute it. Yes, your left pleading for more but that's not because it's left unsatisfactory. No, it's because during the entire film, you're absolutely riveted and captivated! People, this is Barry Levinsons film, headed by De Niro and Michelle Pheifer! Levinson is a genius at his craft as are the formers. This film is bleak and at times depressing but I promise you never for a second not so engaged in it! De Niro becomes Madoff physically even the way he walks. The cast is incredible. Finally De Niro immersed himself into a character that can portray his craft. This is one vehicle, the cast-directing-editing, that sums up to make a masterpiece! This is by far the most captivating, engaging, riveting movie I've seen this year by far! Do yourself a favor and watch this immediately!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24225,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Biography","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-05-20","keywords":"financial fraud,financier,ponzi scheme,fraudster,fraud","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Tonight 8/7c","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi42121497","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY3MDQxNTU0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODkxODczMjI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY3MDQxNTU0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODkxODczMjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of Bernie Madoff and his Ponzi scheme."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000134/","name":"Robert De Niro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000201/","name":"Michelle Pfeiffer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005273/","name":"Alessandro Nivola"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001469/","name":"Barry Levinson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0063961/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506094/","name":"Sam Levinson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2331718/","name":"John Burnham Schwartz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1345603/","name":"Samuel Baum"}],"duration":"PT2H13M"}</script><metacontent="

However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7660850/","name":"Succession","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDE0ODVlYjktNjJiMC00ODk4LWIwNTktMWRhZmZiOGFhYmUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. programme.title: Acts of Violence
Acts of Violence
programme.desc:
Acts of Violence: Directed by Brett Donowho. With Bruce Willis, Cole Hauser, Shawn Ashmore, Ashton Holmes. At a bachelorette party in a nightclub, the bride tells 2 guys offering blow to go away. They abduct her. The groom's 2 big brothers looked after their kid brother as kids and do so now again as veterans, "looking" for her and the 2 guys." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6684714/","name":"Acts of Violence","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM3NzI1NDMyNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzUyMDgzNDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"At a bachelorette party in a nightclub, the bride tells 2 guys offering blow to go away. They abduct her. The groom's 2 big brothers looked after their kid brother as kids and do so now again as veterans, "looking" for her and the 2 ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6684714/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ocallaghanruben"},"dateCreated":"2018-01-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Atrocious is an understatement","reviewBody":"Usually I'll watch any action movie happily. Especially one starting Bruce Willis as a main character. This film however is drop dead awful. Unwatchable. From the gimmicky and unprofessional editing to the delay in the bullets hitting their mark. 

Unrealistic chases and fight scenes where they cut costs by using cameras at various angles to mask the actual fighting. I could only watch 7 or 8 minutes of this torture before I had to stop. Probably the cringiest I have ever felt when watching a movie. So terribly terribly bad. 

I usually watch any more regardless of what IMDB rating it got if it has an actor or two that I like. This film however would receive an absolute zero from me. Instead of checking this movie out in the cinem rewatch a classic. Trust me. You'll thank me later. 

P.S This is my first time writing a review. I created an account with the sole purpose of writing this scathing and honest review."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12014,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime"],"datePublished":"2018-01-12","keywords":"abduction,human trafficking,bachelorette party,bound and gagged,brother brother relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Acts Of Violence","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3117004825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTFiYjIzNjMtMTNmNi00YTY3LTlmNmQtY2E4NDM2NTI5ZjU5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTFiYjIzNjMtMTNmNi00YTY3LTlmNmQtY2E4NDM2NTI5ZjU5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000246/","name":"Bruce Willis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0369513/","name":"Cole Hauser"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0039162/","name":"Shawn Ashmore"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0233078/","name":"Brett Donowho"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0530439/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209560/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0303030/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3996912/","name":"Nicolas Aaron Mezzanatto"}],"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hell on the Border
Hell on the Border
programme.desc: Hell on the Border: Directed by Wes Miller. With David Gyasi, Ron Perlman, Frank Grillo, Manu Intiraymi. Arkansas, 1875, After shooting 5 men to save a judge and then going into Indian Territory after a lethal outlaw, Bass Reeves becomes the first black deputy marshal west of Mississippi." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8652584/","name":"Hell on the Border","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzdiMDI0NDItMzdjOC00MzQwLWEwZGUtN2JjZDBkYmU3YjNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjA3MzE2ODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Arkansas, 1875, After shooting 5 men to save a judge and then going into Indian Territory after a lethal outlaw, Bass Reeves becomes the first black deputy marshal west of Mississippi.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8652584/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"daithiosioradain"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Lame amateurish production unworthy of the true story","reviewBody":"Where to start with the issues? Buildings with beautifully fresh and smoothly sawn walls, houses with aluminium roofs, six shooters that didn't need reloading, disjointed action sequences moving at glacial speeds...... Camerawork was crude, used jerkiness and lens flare etc to no benefit. One of the worst films I've seen in the last year, this was inconsistent, uneven, unrealistic and frankly has nothing to commend it except that it chose a story that should be told. Avoid.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1337,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Biography","Western"],"datePublished":"2019-12-13","keywords":"shooting,shooting a gun into the air,n word,fort smith arkansas,public execution","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Hell On The Border","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2369634073","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWEzNzIyYmMtN2YwYy00ZGZkLTkwNDctY2RkMDk1ZDBjYWM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWEzNzIyYmMtN2YwYy00ZGZkLTkwNDctY2RkMDk1ZDBjYWM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1408543/","name":"David Gyasi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000579/","name":"Ron Perlman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0342029/","name":"Frank Grillo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5090040/","name":"Wes Miller"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0439538/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0333376/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0817147/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5090040/","name":"Wes Miller"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="
